Ritual services in Moscow and Moscow region

Funeral home "Spanritual" carries out its activities providing funeral services in Moscow and the Moscow region, as well as funeral products confirmed by a certificate of quality and conformity.

We offer you professionals in ritual services who have undergone mandatory full training at the Russian State University of Tourism and Service. All ritual agents have a certificate of the state sample in the specialty "Receiver of orders for ritual service" - this allows us to provide ritual services to the population at the appropriate high level.

Budget plan
from 250$
Standart plan
from 500$
Premium plan
from 2 500$
Luxury package
from 8 000$
Elite package
starting at 25 000$

Cost of services

Our funeral home carries out funeral activities (provision of funeral services in Moscow and the Moscow region ) according to the regulations of the charter of the organization within the framework of this Federal Law "On state registration of legal entities" from 08.08.2001g.№-129-FZ., as well as on the basis of this Federal Law "On burial and funeral business" from 08.12.1995g. №-8 FZ RF. Specialist visit to the home / hospital (morgue), as in Moscow SAO, SVAO, NWAO, CAO, VAO, SEAO, Southeast, Southwest, SAO, SAO, TINAO and in the Moscow region FREE of charge.

The death of a person is always an irretrievable loss. Loss of a beloved and close person is an inexpressible grief for his relatives and friends, heartache. At these moments, life seems to "stop", and it is necessary to organize a funeral to adequately conduct a person to the last journey. Being in a stressful state, in grief and with pain in the heart, relatives and friends are not able to organize funerals, and sometimes do not know where to turn. This is when our employee comes to the rescue.

If the worst has happened, call the phone number (495) 799-8378

The Spanritual Funeral Agency is open around the clock, seven days a week. Our funeral service specialist will come to your home, hospital or mortuary free of charge. Funeral agents of the funeral home "Ritual" will not be able to relieve your grief, but will help organize the transportation of the deceased to the morgue, funeral and mourning ceremonies according to your customs and beliefs, as well as a memorial meal. They will take care of all the necessary documents, saving you from the heavy formalities.

We provide assistance with all types of funeral services:

Providing a vehicle to transport the body of the deceased from the home to the morgue.
Paperwork.
Embalming the body.
Assistance in organizing funerals
Shipment (processing of documents regardless of the location of the deceased).
Burying the body, cremation.
Sanitizing and decontaminating the apartment.
Organizing and hosting a memorial luncheon.
Professional live music to accompany the ceremony to bid farewell to the deceased.

A person, when he dies, remains forever in the hearts and memory of his relatives.
We grieve with you...

Q&A

To call a funeral agent, contact us at our hotline number: (495) 799-8378
At the rate "Budget" you can order delivery of a coffin, bedding and ritual accessories, transportation of the cargo to the morgue, as well as registration of the order.
Our technician will arrive at the customer's address 30-40 minutes after the call.
The funeral agent will request the passport of the deceased, and if this document is not available - an extract from the house book.
We offer preparation of a person's body for burial, transportation of the coffin, preparation of the grave, holding a wake, collection of documents.
Yes, at the request of a relative of the deceased or the funeral director it is possible to organize cremation of the body - for this purpose apply to one of the crematoriums in Moscow.
The cost of organizing a funeral depends on the amount of services you order, ritual accessories, coffin and funeral paraphernalia (cross on the grave, etc.).
Yes, we honor people's wishes during their lifetime.
We cooperate with all morgues located in Moscow and Moscow region.
Yes, in which case we will provide you with all the necessary funeral supplies.

Ritual service "Spanritual" - is the main link in the organization of funerals, taking into account the registration of a full package of documents including a death certificate and the provision of necessary ritual goods and services for burial - a coffin, ritual accessories (wreaths, ribbons, crosses, costumes (ritual clothing), plates, photographs and many other accessories), cataphal transport (bus).

The basic financial cost of a funeral is made up of three components:

  • Services Ritual Service «Spanritual»
  • Morgue Services
  • Graveyard Services

Specialists of our office will help to choose a place in the cemetery and calculate the cost of funeral services.
